body:
Did you solve it? I met the problem with you

lstm_cell = tf.contrib.rnn.BasicLSTMCell(dimhidden, forget_bias=1.0)
_LSTM_O, _LSTM_S = tf.contrib.rnn(lstm_cell, _Hsplit,dtype=tf.float32)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
